title: Tslint Task configuration
description: Defines configuration options for the tslint task.

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

extensions.description: The file extensions which the tslint runner will invoke.

tslintIgnore.description: The file patterns which the tslint runner will not invoke.
